provider.title: Model Provider
provider.notFound: Provider not found. Please return to settings.
provider.systemProviderDesc: Model Combo is a built-in virtual provider that uses your configured model combinations. Each model in the combo uses its own API key and base URL.
provider.multiKeyDesc: Enable multiple API keys for load balancing and failover
provider.baseUrlHint: Add # at end to force custom format, or / to keep original

defaultModel.title: Topic Naming
defaultModel.namingModelDesc: Select AI model for auto-generating topic titles
defaultModel.namingPromptDesc: Custom prompt for topic naming. Leave empty for default.
defaultModel.namingPromptPlaceholder: You are a topic expert. Generate a concise, precise, descriptive title based on conversation. Keep it under 10 words. Return only the title text.

modelList.title: Model Settings
modelList.providersDesc: Configure multiple model providers and manage their settings
modelList.topicNamingSettingsDesc: Configure auto topic naming model and options
modelList.modelSelectorDialog: Current: Dialog (click to switch to Dropdown)
modelList.modelSelectorDropdown: Current: Dropdown (click to switch to Dialog)
modelList.addProviderDesc: Set up a new model provider
modelList.deleteConfirmWarning: This will delete these providers and all their configurations. This action cannot be undone.

combo.title: Model Combos
combo.createComboDesc: Create combos for routing, ensemble and more
combo.deleteMessage: Delete combo "{{name}}"? This can't be undone.

deleteProvider.title: Delete Provider
deleteProvider.message: Delete <bold>{{name}}</bold>? All related configs will be removed.

headers.title: Custom Headers
headers.description: For CORS issues or special authentication
headers.removeHint: Set value to "REMOVE" to disable default headers

customEndpoint.title: Custom Endpoint
customEndpoint.description: Enter full endpoint URL. System will merge models from both default and custom endpoints.
customEndpoint.helperText: Enter full URL including protocol (http:// or https://)
